cn.edu.uestc.acmicpc.oj.interceptor.iface

Interface IActionInterceptor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseAction, ContestAction, ContestAdminAction, ContestListAction, ContestStatementAdminAction, FileUploadAction, IndexAction, IndexAction, LoginAction, LogoutAction, ProblemAction, ProblemAdminAction, ProblemDataAdminAction, ProblemListAction, ProblemPictureAdminAction, ProblemStatementAdminAction, RegisterAction, StatusAction, SubmitAction, TestAction, TestFileUploadAction, UserActivateAction, UserAdminAction, UserCenterAction

    public interface IActionInterceptor
    Interceptor for all actions.

    Implement onActionExecuting method to execute codes before action is invoked.

    Implement onActionExecuted method to execute codes after action is invoke.

    Author:
    fish
    See Also:
    AppInterceptor.ActionInfo

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onActionExecuted()
      This method will be invoked after action is executed.
      void onActionExecuting(AppInterceptor.ActionInfo actionInfo)
      This method will be invoked before action is executed.

        This method will be invoked before action is executed.
        Parameters:

      • onActionExecuted

        void onActionExecuted()
        This method will be invoked after action is executed.
